document.full_text: the unbuckling of two tectonic plates shifted japan's coastline by up to 13 feet, and a 250-mile-long section dropped in altitude by about two feet.
document.title: quake moves japan closer to u.s. and alters earth's spin
lines_and_colors: the unbuckling of two tectonic plates shifted japan's coastline by up to 13 feet, and a 250-mile-long section dropped in altitude by about two feet.
